about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm Artur Canto, a Back-end Python developer passionate about automation, efficiency, and product growth. I focus on solving problems, delivering fast, measuring results, and continuously improving solutions. I've developed internal systems, e-commerce websites, and automations that eliminated manual processes. Always learning, always building.
